text: Hi I have setup 4 peers on different vm all on different cloud
I am trying to deploy chaincode and i get OK via REST
I can see connections getting between VM and see all VM in action when I deploy chaincode
but then when I query data , i dont see data gettung fetched
can any one suggest where am I wrong

Does anyone have insight into whether Java chaincode currently works with a Blockchain network running Hyperledger Fabric V0.6.1 if security is enabled for the network?  There is a dWAnswers question where someone is experiencing errors with Java chaincode when security is enabled (<https://developer.ibm.com/answers/questions/342814/java-secured-support-on-bluemix-blockchain/>).  There was a Stack Overflow post from last September that indicated Java chaincode didn't work with security enabled (<http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39403727/hyperledger-fabric-java-chaincode-error>).  Is that still the case?

attachments.title: Java (secured) support on Bluemix Blockchain?
attachments.text: Hi, I have seen that Java is supported starting at 0.6.1 version of the Hyperledger Fabric. And I have been able to send a 'deploy' request to the Bluemix Hyperledger including a Java chaincode. But then I face the already reported problem when security is enabled: OUT - [31m07:30:49.326 [dockercontroller] deployImage -> ERRO 8898[0m Error building images: API error (500): Error response from daemon: The Dockerfile (Dockerfile) cannot be empty OUT - [31m07:30:49.326 [dockercontroller] deployImage -> ERRO 8899[0m Image Output: OUT - ******************** OUT - OUT - ******************** OUT - [31m07:30:49.824 [dockercontroller] Start -> ERRO 889a[0m start-could not recreate container API error (500): Error: image library/a7580939db4f43f99522baae69467634-vp0-565059c290080c214a90994b97a346ff941380d3d11781f143b4776a0c3fbece1b537f4e268e7e1be6b28b0fea287b503f0f094d9a06a11e566fbe6db01d4f43:latest not found OUT - [31m07:30:49.824 [chaincode] Launch -> ERRO 889b[0m launchAndWaitForRegister failed Error starting container: API error (500): Error: image library/a7580939db4f43f99522baae69467634-vp0-565059c290080c214a90994b97a346ff941380d3d11781f143b4776a0c3fbece1b537f4e268e7e1be6b28b0fea287b503f0f094d9a06a11e566fbe6db01d4f43:latest not found As security cannot be disabled in Bluemix, is there a way to deploy this Java chaincodes? Am I missing any additional parameter? Otherwise, is Java chaincode in secured hyperledger going to be available soon? Thanks in advance.

attachments.text: i used peer chaincode deploy to run go src example, i got the right result,then i tried the java src example, enter image description here i got a chaincode,but when i used this chaincode for que...

text: Question: Dear,  Do we have Audit Trail/History of Variables Values for all the INVOKE in ChainCode?:    In bitcoin, all valid transaction (e.g.  user A=> user B (5 BTC), user B=>user C (3 BTC)) will be recorded in the Bitcoin Block. This provides an audit trail feature.   Do we have any audit trail record for variables changed in ChainCode ? If no, we cannot find out the history of the variable.      Thank you.
Hello <@U2Y2V95D2> this is in the works for Fabric v1.0  see Jira 1502  <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-1502>
Thanks <@U0YJUECE8> .  So, I need to upgrade to use Fabric v1.0 to enjoy this feature (variable history). Seems quite different between v1.0 and v0.6.
